NewMonopoly

Class Monopoly

  • java.lang.Object
    • NewMonopoly.Monopoly

  • public class Monopoly
extends java.lang.Object
    This here is the fruit of four years of development. With every passing year, it seemed like I was starting a new version of Monopoly with new coding skills and a new understanding of proper code. I can't say I'm very good even now but I'm proud of how this project has come out. This class itself is the start and end for the game. This class holds all of the global variables and methods and was always the start for my project. Thank you for trying virtual recreation of Monopoly in Java. I don't make any claims to the game itself, only the code. I never intend to make any profit off of this project, only as a pet project by which to test my skills. I truly hope you enjoy this game
    Author:
    Miguel Salazar
